A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Very good Starwars movie. Better than Ep VII\, which I felt in some parts like a reboot. 
This new episode\, The Last Jedi\, has it all: tons of very well made special effects\, a lot of action sequences\, even humor. And\, of course some incredible twists in the story that surprise the audience.

Ep VII develops more of Kilo Ren's internal conflict\, and shows how he continues his journey through the dark side.

Just a very few disappointments\, like Captain Phasma\, which in my view is a character "underused".

Overall\, great movie. One of my favorites among the entire saga.
